channel.title: Posts on Siddythings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Siddythings

item.title: Serialization - Django REST framework| Ep. 02
item.description:
In this tutorial, we’ll be covering creating a simple Web API.

Along the way, it will introduce the various components that make up the REST framework and give you a comprehensive understanding of how everything fits together.

item.title: Your First Django Application | Ep. 01
item.description: In this part, you will be creating a simple REST application with minimum requirements. We’re going to use a virtual environment throughout this series of learning.

item.title: Query strings in Flask | Ep. 12
item.description:
Hello,

In this segment, we’re going to working with query strings. A query string is part of the URL as a string of parameters.

item.title: Flask Database Query | Ep. 11
item.description: Hi, In this segment, we are learning about displaying the records and Querying our data.

item.title: Flask Database with Flask-SQLAlchemy | Ep. 10
item.description:
Hello,

In this segment, we are going to look at how to interact with the database in the flask.

item.title: Flask configuration files | Ep. 09
item.description:
Hello,

In this segment, we are talking about the configuration file. We’re going to talk about the configuration method, using a config file.

item.title: Dynamic URLs with Flask | Ep. 08
item.description: Hii, In this segment, we are learning about mapping routes to a navbar and create dynamic URLs.

item.title: Creating forms with Flask | Ep. 07
item.description: Hello, In this segment, we are going to talk about Forms. Forms are the way to take user inputs. You’ll learn about post form to a flask view and work with incoming data.

item.title: Jinja Templating Flask Part-02 | Ep. 06
item.description: Hello, This segment is going to a bit more about Jinja templating. In the last segment, you have to learn how to create base templates, child templates, and how to extend and include templates.

item.title: Adding HTML files | Ep. 03
item.description: Hello Guys in this part, we are going to bind our application with an HTML page.

item.title: Adding static files Flask | Ep. 04
item.description: Hii, In this segment, we are learning about how to add stylesheets, javascript, and images to our application.

item.title: Jinja Templating Flask | Ep. 05
item.description: Hello, In the last segment, we talk a bit about Jinja templating. So in this segment, we are going to learn about How to work with Jinja templating engine with Html.

item.title: Flask application structure | Ep. 02
item.description: This part is about how to structure your application and create new routes. You’ll learn about the different structure of your application.

item.title: Top Interview Questions
item.description: Hii, I know your preparing for your interview, So here I m to help you to list down some of the most common questions asked in the interview.

item.title: Your First Flask Applaction | Ep. 01
item.description:
Im Glad you think to learn Flask.

In this part, you will be creating a simple web application with minimum requirements.

We’re going to use a virtual environment throughout this series of learning.
